        API Call: GET /vdc/fabric/nodes

        Returns:
        the list of node references.

      • list

        public java.util.List<FabricNode> list(int index,
                              int max)
        Lists a specified set of nodes

        API Call: GET /vdc/fabric/nodes?max={max}&index={index}

        Parameters:
        index - index where to start in the list of items
        max - maximum number of items to return, or -1 if all
        Returns:
        the list of node references.

      • getDisks

        public java.util.List<NodeDisk> getDisks(java.net.URI id,
                                int index,
                                int max)
        Gets all disks on node.

        API Call: GET /vdc/fabric/nodes/{id}/disks?index={index}&max={max}

        Parameters:
        id - The Node
        id - The Service
        index - index where to start in the list of nodes
        max - maximum number of nodes to return, or -1 if all

        A list of the disks on the node
